Thanks for trying out Supporttr :) For easy input of Bitcoin addresses you need a QR-Code scanning app. Would you like to download one for free?
For sending Bitcoin donations you need a wallet app. Would you like to download one for free?

Missing feature in your wallet app

As far as we know the wallet app you have installed has no support for the BIP70 payment protocol yet. So you need to authenticate every single donation manually and multiple Bitcoin transactions fees need to be paid in the process. Would you like to additionally download a wallet that supports this feature for free? Cancel to use your actual wallet.
